title: can you tell me as many shower...

messages.content: can you tell me as many shower thoughts as you know

Sure, here are some popular "shower thoughts" that people have shared:

1. The other side of the pillow might be watching.
2. If you're not supposed to eat at night, then why do we have a fridge in the kitchen?
3. Is it weird that I just checked my reflection in the mirror right now and answered myself back?
4. People who use self-serve grocery stores are just baby customers.
5. The more you try to ignore someone, the more they want your attention.
6. If a tree falls in the forest and no one is around to hear it, does it make a sound? And if so, did it also create an echo?
7. Time flies like an arrow, fruit flies like a banana.
8. My mind sometimes feels like my closet - too many clothes (thoughts) crammed in there with nowhere to put them all.
9. If you're running on empty and fill up at the gas station instead of the gas tank, are you just adding more emptiness?
10. We live in a world where we can order food from our phones but still have to walk outside to get change for a dollar bill.
11. It's ironic that when you try to be quiet during class, your mouth becomes louder than ever before.
12. When someone says "don't think about an elephant," what are you doing? You're thinking about an elephant!
13. Is it weird how we sleep on pillows but put our phones face down?
14. If money talks, why does everyone sound so broke when they talk about their financial situation?
15. It's strange that humans need physical contact to feel complete while also needing solitude for self-reflection.
16. We judge people who don't shower enough as "unhygienic," yet we often forget our own hygiene after a long day at work or school.
17. If you can't beat them, join them - but what if they're already in your group?
18. When someone asks for directions, it's like they're admitting that their GPS is broken.
19. You know you're getting old when you start saying "when I was your age..." instead of "back in my day..."
